overview: This all-sexer finds heroine Candace Hart in bed with Heather Hart and Avalon. They’ve got nothing better to do, so they fool around. While doing so, Candace imagines herself in various other sexual situations; e.g., a seduction of Jordan Smith, porn’s incredible skinny man. The ladies even watch a video or two. Clever, eh what. Thus we are able to see Christy Canyon suck off Mr. Smith and wonder of wonders, he comes in her mouth and she swallows it. You fans of such unusual happenings should like that. The rest of us who are just a tad bit tired of the current shows that substitute extra sex in place of imagination might want a bit more.
title: Dreams of Candace Hart
